file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO25_DAY1】hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony hololive STAGE2【チラ見せ】 [4C3kreEOk1Q]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Hakos Baelz performs "Shout It Out" on the main stage.
Transition featuring a laser light show and a countdown for the next performer.
Houshou Marine performs "Shoujo Reishiki" on a special elevated stage box.
